input.sentences: the bride of the wedding has her picture taken in front of a luxury car .
a wedding guest tries some dance moves before the event begins .
friends and family gather at their tables for the wedding reception
the arrangements provided for the wedding are absolutely stunning .
a wedding guest has taken a wide-shot photograph of the space the event was held in .
output.sentences: Today was my friend, Adhira's wedding and I was sure going to take plenty of pictures of the luxury event.
Before the wedding, our friend Devya was practicing her moves around another guest.
The wedding tables at the reception was arranged so that everyone could sit with their families.
The wedding centerpiece sure stunned, and we were all eager to thank Devya's Mom as she had provided that.
The hall wasn't wide, but this was only to be her wedding in the USA, and back in her country there would be a lot more guests and plenty of space for the crowd.
